mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adviewlist SET adid=#{adid}, adno=#{adno}, userid=#{userid}, point=#{point}, viewtime=SYSDATE, count=count+1 WHERE adno=#{adno} AND userid=#{userid}
mapper.select: SELECT sum(count) FROM adviewlist WHERE adid=#{adid} AND adno=#{adno}
SELECT count,adid,adno,viewtime FROM adviewlist WHERE adid=#{adid} AND adno=#{adno} ORDER BY (viewtime) DESC

SELECT sum(count) FROM adviewlist WHERE adno=#{adno} AND SELECT(viewtime FROM adviewlist WHERE adid=#{adid}) BETWEEN (SELECT to_char(sysdate -30 ,'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss') FROM DUAL) AND (select to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss') FROM DUAL);
